1.0.name: wordpress/live-support
1.0.description:
This plugin helps you to embed the call button in your website without changing your theme files.

You need API key from https://calltosupport.com. After you have kept the API key, your vistors can make web to web voice calls for free.

Note : You need to login to operator panel of https://calltosupport.com to receive the calls.

For more details visit https://calltosupport.com
